net.gree.asdk.api.ui
Class RequestDialog

java.lang.Object
  AuthorizableDialog
      net.gree.asdk.api.ui.RequestDialog

public final class RequestDialog
extends AuthorizableDialog

Class which represents the dialog for sending Request Service.

The event of the result of request sending is notified to Handler.
When a request is completely sent, the request ID and the result of the request sending for the sender are notified as JSON data.

Sample code: 
 Handler handler = new Handler() {
   public void handleMessage(Message message) {
     switch (message.what) {
       case RequestDialog.OPENED:
         Log.d(TAG, "RequestDialog opened");
         break;
       case RequestDialog.CLOSED:
         Log.d(TAG, "RequestDialog closed");
         String returnStr = (String) message.obj;
         break;
     }
   }
 };

 RequestDialog dialog = new RequestDialog(Activity.this);
 dialog.setHandler(handler);

 TreeMap<String,Object> map = new TreeMap<String,Object>();
 map.put("title", "Request Title");
 map.put("body", "Send to Request");
 dialog.setParams(map);
 dialog.show();

Author:
GREE, Inc.

Field Summary
static int CLOSED
           Handler event type which notified when request dialog is finished to close.
This event have additional parameter "message.obj" as request results in handler's message.
static int OPENED
          Handler event type which notified when request dialog is started to open.
static int USER_ID_LIST_MAX_NUM
          Max number which you can send request message to.

show

public final void show()
Start show up dialog.

setParams

public void setParams(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
Set optional parameter. Parameter is passed as TreeMap object.

Parameters:
params - TreeMap object which having the following keys as elements.
-title - request title. It is required param.
-body - a message sent with request. It is required param.
-list_type - Select user type which you want to send. ('all', 'joined', 'not_joined', 'specified'(used with to_user_id))
-to_user_id - Array as user id string which you want to send request.
-expire_time - unix timestamp or UTC time string.
-attrs - Return parameter when a user click the link in request. It is set as JSONObject. - {"param1":"value1","param2":"value2"}
